name: Dungeons & Prisoners-Dragon Maiden and the Island of the Mausoleum
name_original: Dungeons & Prisoners-Dragon Maiden and the Island of the Mausoleum
description:
◆ Tactical RPG for adults ◆
All battle scenes will be turn-based battles on the MAP screen.
In some cases, you may be violated during battle.
You may also be imprisoned depending on where you were defeated.

◆ Detailed status display ◆
Most of your sexual experience and physical condition will be displayed in your status
Recommended for those who are excited about numbers

◆ Standing picture display corresponding to changing clothes for each part ◆
There is an animation of standing pictures being violated * 2 patterns are planned
Some characters on the map are also violated and animated

◆ Stress-free ◆
・ Quick save and quick load available
・ Always dash, instant message display, volume control, etc.
Can be set with various configurations
-Equipped with frame skip that doubles the speed of movement and animation
・ If the battle is troublesome, automatic battle is also possible.

◆ Around 40 planned CG images (excluding differences, standing pictures, parts, etc.) ◆

◆ For enthusiasts ◆
There is almost no element of harmony with the opposite sex
Includes some expressions such as heterogeneous pregnancy, cuckolding, tentacles, bizarreness, scatology, etc.
* Bizarre and scat can be filtered by config.
